conversion_verification.notes: Second image remains a top-down 2D floor plan style rendering with textures; no vertical wall extrusion, no visible wall side faces, and no isometric/elevated perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Automatic rejection (E0-FATAL): no true 3D wall height/thickness and view is pure top-down.

detected_errors.description: Not a true 3D conversion: no wall height/side faces, no interior volume, and no angled/isometric perspective (still a 2D top-down plan).

summary: The second image is a stylized top-down 2D plan rather than an isometric cutaway 3D model with extruded walls and visible interior volume.
